about_the_game:
Why Made This Game:

* Craving the fun of city building without the burden of remembering complex building functions.
* Busy with work and study, unable to devote long hours to extensive games.
* A pure building experience, without dealing with the daily issues of virtual citizens.


《Shanshui Haven》 is a casual building placement game, every player can easily engage and enjoy the joy of building towns.

Game Features:

* Randomly Generated Grid Map: Every game is a brand new challenge, bringing you endless exploratory fun.
* Strategic Building Placement: Choose the right locations to place buildings, maximize your population score, and showcase your strategic wisdom.
* Diverse Buildings: Each building has its unique footprint and scoring rules; use them flexibly to build your dream city.
* Ancient Chinese-style Architecture: Feel as if you are immersed in a flowing ancient Chinese scroll.

2 Game Modes:

* Casual Mode: Perfect for players looking to relax and unwind. A stress-free experience where you can take your time and enjoy the game at your own pace.
* High Score Mode: For those seeking to step up their game and tackle some tough scenarios. Test your skills and strategy in a more demanding setting.


Do not buy this game if you are:
* A hardcore city-building enthusiast
* Looking for a multiplayer gaming experience
* Expecting an epic storyline
* Interested in conquest and combat elements
* A severe OCD sufferer

Consider buying this game if you:
* Enjoy a relaxed and pleasant gaming atmosphere
* Like games that are easy to pick up and addictive
* Are mildly OCD-friendly
* Willing to support a couple of indie game developers for a coffee's price

In the game, you need to cleverly layout buildings and consider their interactions with each other. As your score steadily climbs, the level of your town will also gradually increase, unlocking new maps filled with challenges. At this point, you can continue to build your town, enhancing its level and unlocking more buildings. The game ends when there are no more plots or buildings that can be placed on the map. At that moment, you can proudly admire your architectural masterpiece, feeling the fruits of your wisdom and effort.


Small Tips:
* Sometimes, for the sake of potentially higher scores in the future, you might need to adopt long-term strategies rather than the best immediate options. Your patience and wisdom will be rewarded throughout the game's progress.
* Although the game itself is not competitive, you can compare your scores with players worldwide and experience more challenges and fun by viewing the player leaderboard.

After unlocking the new town, you can also choose to continue building it to achieve a higher score. Keep going until you run out of plots or buildings, and then take a look at the town you've meticulously crafted.

Inspired by the following games:
Minesweeper
Islanders
Tetris
Civilization
